reviewText: Some episodes are on YouTube if you want a preview. A taste of satire can go a long way! Make sure your TV plays PAL -- my DVD player is multi-region but I found that my older flatscreen only plays NTSC so have to play these on my computer.
great silly comedy for clever people.

I've only seen about 10 minutes of the first episode.  I went in cold and had no idea it was not a serious crime drama.  I had to stop watching because there are varying opinions of this type of humor in my household but I found it hilarious.  Think about a cross of Big Train and a cop show.
